name: AI Attack Game 🚀👾
description:
Play this game in fullscreen (pc), thank you.

Hello, internet! 👋

This game was my homework, it turned out nice so I wanted to share it publicly. Not looking for reviews, just wanted to expand my porfolio.

Find my tileset here: https://helleworld.itch.io/industrialscifi-top-down-tileset

Controls: Buy different turrets and place them on the map. They'll attack the enemies. Survive each round to win.
